short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free plugin for influencer marketing analytics and creator discovery with detailed profile insights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the Wednesday Chrome extension, your go-to tool for influencer marketing analytics and creator discovery. Here’s what you’ll get:

 • Unlimited profile views with access to unlock 50 full creator profiles.

 • Detailed audience demographics for TikTok and Instagram, helping you understand the followers behind each creator.

 • Estimated price range to quickly assess potential partnerships.

 • Cost per Engagement & Cost per View metrics to ensure your budget is optimized for maximum ROI.

Get quick access to in-depth influencer stats and reach out to influencers directly from your browser. Key metrics include:

- Post Engagement Rate
- Total Reach
- Average Views
- Average Likes
- Average comments
- Audience Demographics

Enhance your influencer marketing strategy with the Wednesday Chrome Extension today!
